name: The Folder Game
description:
A Whole game, Made of folders.

You are just using your computer, when suddenly, you notice a file on your computer that has never been there before. You decide to investigate.

This game is still in development and will take a while to complete.

You do not need to unzip the file, but I recommend doing so.

DELETE THE OLD VERSIONS OF THE GAME BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD NEW VERSIONS, IT MAY CONFLICT WITH ITSELF
